name: Kids Fruit Puzzles - Wooden Jigsaw
description:
baby fruit wooden jigsaw puzzle, offers hours of FUN for kids! your kids and toddlers will be happy to explore different favorite fruits, in addition it will help to develop memory, logical thinking, visual perception and fine motor skills of your babies.

This baby jigsaw puzzle is one of the best way to educate your baby for coming challenges in pre-school education.


Features of this free educational baby wooden jigsaw puzzle game

- Sharpens your toddlers / babies and kids brain
- Learning while playing
- Easy to learn and play. Just drag and drop wooden jigsaw object to matching shape.
- Skills development to match and remember different parts, color and shapes
- Soft and stimulating sounds
- High quality appealing colors & cute hd pictures
- Many different levels, check the game once to explore more
- Improves level of education

All in one free game for your children.

kids fruit puzzles - wooden jigsaw have following fruit puzzles

- Apple
- Mango
- Grapes
- Strawberry
- Pomegranate
- Apricot
- Bananas
- Peach
- Orange
- Papaya
- Watermelon
- Coconut

We are working on adding more fruit puzzles for your toddlers. Kindly share your feedback on contact@skycap.co.in we would love to hear what more you need for your toddlers, kids and babies.
